**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 81 **Archetype** [Zephyr Guard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=35) **Prerequisites** [Zephyr Guard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1154); Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) --- When you attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects. **Critical Success** For 1 round, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed and a –4 status penalty to Stealth.
**Success** For 1 round, the target takes a –5-foot status penalty to Speed and a –2 status penalty to Stealth.
name: Decry Thief
prerequisite: Zephyr Guard Dedication; Trained in Intimidation
